description from knitty com

men s mittens with allover stranded design a man i know mentioned that he would love to own some knit wool mittens i decided to knit him a pair

both mittens are worked the same and can be worn on either hand you will have extra yarn and can make a third mitten as a spare in case one gets lost

these mittens are knit tightly to keep the cold wisconsin winter winds off your hands
